t: Luke 11
The Model Prayer
Now*p it came to pass, as He was praying in a certain place, when He ceased, that*i one of His disciples said to Him, “Lord, teach us to pray, as John also taught his disciples.”

So*p He said to them, “When*r you*r pray,*r say:*r Our*rpn Father*r in*r heaven,*r Hallowed*rld be*r Your*r name.*r Your*rld kingdom*r come.*r Your*rld will*r be*r done*r On*rld earth*r as*r it*ir is*ir in*r heaven.*r
Give*rld us*r day*r by*r day*r our*r daily*r bread.*r

And*rld forgive*r us*r our*r sins,*r For*rld we*r also*r forgive*r everyone*r who*r is*r indebted*r to*r us.*r And*rld do*r not*r lead*r us*r into*r temptation,*r But*rld deliver*r us*r from*r the*r evil*r one.”*r
A Friend Comes at Midnight
And*p He said to them, “Which*r of*r you*r shall*r have*r a*r friend,*r and*r go*r to*r him*r at*r midnight*r and*r say*r to*r him,*r ‘Friend,*r lend*r me*r three*r loaves;*r
for*r a*r friend*r of*r mine*r has*r come*r to*r me*r on*r his*r journey,*r and*r I*r have*r nothing*r to*r set*r before*r him’;*r

and*r he*r will*r answer*r from*r within*r and*r say,*r ‘Do*r not*r trouble*r me;*r the*r door*r is*r now*r shut,*r and*r my*r children*r are*r with*r me*r in*r bed;*r I*r cannot*r rise*r and*r give*r to*r you’?*r

I*r say*r to*r you,*r though*r he*r will*r not*r rise*r and*r give*r to*r him*r because*r he*r is*r his*r friend,*r yet*r because*r of*r his*r persistence*r he*r will*r rise*r and*r give*r him*r as*r many*r as*r he*r needs.*r
Keep Asking, Seeking, Knocking

For*r everyone*r who*r asks*r receives,*r and*r he*r who*r seeks*r finds,*r and*r to*r him*r who*r knocks*r it*r will*r be*r opened.*r

Or*r if*r he*r asks*r for*r an*r egg,*r will*r he*r offer*r him*r a*r scorpion?*r

If*r you*r then,*r being*r evil,*r know*r how*r to*r give*r good*r gifts*r to*r your*r children,*r how*r much*r more*r will*r your*ir heavenly*r Father*r give*r the*r Holy*r Spirit*r to*r those*r who*r ask*r Him!”*r
A House Divided Cannot Stand
And*p He was casting out a demon, and it was mute. So it was, when the demon had gone out, that the mute spoke; and the multitudes marveled.
But some of them said, “He casts out demons by Beelzebub, the ruler of the demons.”
Others,*p testing Him,*i sought from Him a sign from heaven.
But He, knowing their thoughts, said to them: “Every*r kingdom*r divided*r against*r itself*r is*r brought*r to*r desolation,*r and*r a*r house*r divided*ir against*r a*r house*r falls.*r
If*r Satan*r also*r is*r divided*r against*r himself,*r how*r will*r his*r kingdom*r stand?*r Because*r you*r say*r I*r cast*r out*r demons*r by*r Beelzebub.*r
And*r if*r I*r cast*r out*r demons*r by*r Beelzebub,*r by*r whom*r do*r your*r sons*r cast*r them*ir out?*r Therefore*r they*r will*r be*r your*r judges.*r
But*r if*r I*r cast*r out*r demons*r with*r the*r finger*r of*r God,*r surely*r the*r kingdom*r of*r God*r has*r come*r upon*r you.*r
When*r a*r strong*r man,*r fully*r armed,*r guards*r his*r own*r palace,*r his*r goods*r are*r in*r peace.*r
But*r when*r a*r stronger*r than*r he*r comes*r upon*r him*r and*r overcomes*r him,*r he*r takes*r from*r him*r all*r his*r armor*r in*r which*r he*r trusted,*r and*r divides*r his*r spoils.*r
He*r who*r is*r not*r with*r Me*r is*r against*r Me,*r and*r he*r who*r does*r not*r gather*r with*r Me*r scatters.*r

Then*r he*r goes*r and*r takes*r with*r him*ir seven*r other*r spirits*r more*r wicked*r than*r himself,*r and*r they*r enter*r and*r dwell*r there;*r and*r the*r last*r state*ir of*r that*r man*r is*r worse*r than*r the*r first.”*r
Keeping the Word
And*p it happened, as He spoke these things, that a certain woman from the crowd raised her voice and said to Him, “Blessed is*i the womb that bore You, and the*i breasts which nursed You!”
But*p He said, “More*r than*r that,*r blessed*r are*ir those*r who*r hear*r the*r word*r of*r God*r and*r keep*r it!”*r
Seeking a Sign

And*p while the crowds were thickly gathered together, He began to say, “This*r is*r an*r evil*r generation.*r It*r seeks*r a*r sign,*r and*r no*r sign*r will*r be*r given*r to*r it*r except*r the*r sign*r of*r Jonah*r the*r prophet.*r
For*r as*r Jonah*r became*r a*r sign*r to*r the*r Ninevites,*r so*r also*r the*r Son*r of*r Man*r will*r be*r to*r this*r generation.*r

The*r queen*r of*r the*r South*r will*r rise*r up*r in*r the*r judgment*r with*r the*r men*r of*r this*r generation*r and*r condemn*r them,*r for*r she*r came*r from*r the*r ends*r of*r the*r earth*r to*r hear*r the*r wisdom*r of*r Solomon;*r and*r indeed*r a*r greater*r than*r Solomon*r is*ir here.*r

The*r men*r of*r Nineveh*r will*r rise*r up*r in*r the*r judgment*r with*r this*r generation*r and*r condemn*r it,*r for*r they*r repented*r at*r the*r preaching*r of*r Jonah;*r and*r indeed*r a*r greater*r than*r Jonah*r is*ir here.*r
The Lamp of the Body

“No*rp one,*r when*r he*r has*r lit*r a*r lamp,*r puts*r it*ir in*r a*r secret*r place*r or*r under*r a*r basket,*r but*r on*r a*r lampstand,*r that*r those*r who*r come*r in*r may*r see*r the*r light.*r

The*r lamp*r of*r the*r body*r is*r the*r eye.*r Therefore,*r when*r your*r eye*r is*r good,*r your*r whole*r body*r also*r is*r full*r of*r light.*r But*r when*r your*ir eye*ir is*r bad,*r your*r body*r also*r is*ir full*r of*r darkness.*r
Therefore*r take*r heed*r that*r the*r light*r which*r is*r in*r you*r is*r not*r darkness.*r

If*r then*r your*r whole*r body*r is*ir full*r of*r light,*r having*r no*r part*r dark,*r the*ir whole*r body*ir will*r be*r full*r of*r light,*r as*r when*r the*r bright*r shining*r of*r a*r lamp*r gives*r you*r light.”*r
Woe to the Pharisees and Lawyers
And*p as He spoke, a certain Pharisee asked Him to dine with him. So He went in and sat down to eat.
When the Pharisee saw it,*i he marveled that He had not first washed before dinner.
Then*p the Lord said to him, “Now*r you*r Pharisees*r make*r the*r outside*r of*r the*r cup*r and*r dish*r clean,*r but*r your*r inward*r part*r is*r full*r of*r greed*r and*r wickedness.*r
Foolish*r ones!*r Did*r not*r He*r who*r made*r the*r outside*r make*r the*r inside*r also?*r
But*r rather*r give*r alms*r of*r such*r things*r as*r you*r have;*r then*r indeed*r all*r things*r are*r clean*r to*r you.*r

“But*rp woe*r to*r you*r Pharisees!*r For*r you*r tithe*r mint*r and*r rue*r and*r all*r manner*r of*r herbs,*r and*r pass*r by*r justice*r and*r the*r love*r of*r God.*r These*r you*r ought*r to*r have*r done,*r without*r leaving*r the*r others*r undone.*r
Woe*r to*r you*r Pharisees!*r For*r you*r love*r the*r best*r seats*r in*r the*r synagogues*r and*r greetings*r in*r the*r marketplaces.*r

Then*p one of the lawyers answered and said to Him, “Teacher, by saying these things You reproach us also.”

And*p He said, “Woe*r to*r you*r also,*r lawyers!*r For*r you*r load*r men*r with*r burdens*r hard*r to*r bear,*r and*r you*r yourselves*r do*r not*r touch*r the*r burdens*r with*r one*r of*r your*r fingers.*r
Woe*r to*r you!*r For*r you*r build*r the*r tombs*r of*r the*r prophets,*r and*r your*r fathers*r killed*r them.*r
In*r fact,*r you*r bear*r witness*r that*r you*r approve*r the*r deeds*r of*r your*r fathers;*r for*r they*r indeed*r killed*r them,*r and*r you*r build*r their*r tombs.*r
Therefore*r the*r wisdom*r of*r God*r also*r said,*r ‘I*r will*r send*r them*r prophets*r and*r apostles,*r and*r some*ir of*r them*r they*r will*r kill*r and*r persecute,’*r
that*r the*r blood*r of*r all*r the*r prophets*r which*r was*r shed*r from*r the*r foundation*r of*r the*r world*r may*r be*r required*r of*r this*r generation,*r

from*r the*r blood*r of*r Abel*r to*r the*r blood*r of*r Zechariah*r who*r perished*r between*r the*r altar*r and*r the*r temple.*r Yes,*r I*r say*r to*r you,*r it*r shall*r be*r required*r of*r this*r generation.*r

“Woe*rp to*r you*r lawyers!*r For*r you*r have*r taken*r away*r the*r key*r of*r knowledge.*r You*r did*r not*r enter*r in*r yourselves,*r and*r those*r who*r were*r entering*r in*r you*r hindered.”*r

lying in wait for Him, and seeking to catch Him in something He might say, that they might accuse Him.
